amendment.description: To reduce the eligibility age for receipt of nonregular military service retired pay for members of the Ready Reserve in active federal status or on active duty for significant periods and to expand eligibility of members of the Selected Reserve for coverage under the TRICARE program.

action.text: Amendment SA 4365 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4365 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
